[DQC.US.0127.9592] The statement 000300 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF INCOME (Unaudited) includes the concept us-gaap:NoninterestExpense in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called us-gaap:StatementTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions srt:ProductOrServiceAxis. The statement presentation group 000300 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF INCOME (Unaudited) includes a presentation concept called us-gaap:NoninterestExpense. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table us-gaap:StatementTable:
us-gaap:NoninterestExpense = 82,599,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table us-gaap:StatementTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
In this case the concept NoninterestExpense is missing from the definition linkbase table nd should be added.
Total Element : us-gaap:NoninterestExpense Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-06-30 Dimensions :
Rule Element Id:9592 Rule version: 17.0.0RC5 - http://xbrl.fasb.org/us-gaap/2020/elts/us-gaap-2020-01-31.xsd 10832

The filing uses an XBRL table called us-gaap:StatementTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions srt:ProductOrServiceAxis. The statement presentation group 000300 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF INCOME (Unaudited) includes a presentation concept called us-gaap:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table us-gaap:StatementTable:
us-gaap:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit = 4,846,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table us-gaap:StatementTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
In this case the concept IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit is missing from the definition linkbase table nd should be added.
Total Element : us-gaap:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-06-30 Dimensions :
Rule Element Id:9592 Rule version: 17.0.0RC5 - http://xbrl.fasb.org/us-gaap/2020/elts/us-gaap-2020-01-31.xsd 7695
